message: I'm hoping Apple will integrate Thunderbolt across all Mac models, although Intel is saying they will support both Thunderbolt and USB 3.0. We all know Thunderbolt can do high-speed much better, but do you guys think it will be another Firewire in terms of PC adoption, compared to USB 3.0?
Hope you're right. It would actually make sense (contrary to some of Apple's choices sometimes)!
Think Thunderbolt will integrated in every Model upgrade this year. Then cables will also available ;-).
Thunderbolt has much more capabilities that USB 3.0.
Not every time win the better system...
